creator: schulz@videotron.ca
text:
BoundedFIFO
1) does not synchronize on the vital put/get methods. This can lead
   to arbitrary corruption and loss of data.
2) wasFull and wasEmpty methods are not thread safe, i.e.
   they can (and eventually will) give the wrong answer.
   To be removed without replacement.

creator: schulz@videotron.ca
text:
Technically this is a Helper, so I changed Component to Other, although
this affects the AsyncAppender mostly.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
I don't suppose you could provide us a test case that shows either of these 
problems?  If we can reproduce your results, we'll be glad to fix them 
immediately.
